replies.bodyText: The entity parameters in the models are named entity. We don't name them after the type. (that's what the method's parameter types are for)
replies.author: Sollace

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            		COMMENT This is the main bone used to animate the tail. It contains {@link #real_tail} as one of its children.
          
          
            
            		COMMENT The main bone used to animate the tail. Contains {@link #realTail} as one of its children.
timeline.author: YanisBft

replies.bodyText: Arguably worse than speaking in full sentences.

replies.bodyText: The link target should still be changed tho

replies.bodyText: Usually field comments use that format.
